channel.title: GCon - Projekt Dark Prometheus - Moscow 1942
channel.description:
Competent Sparks, Jacob Drexler, joins Plucky Private Spencer, Educated Advisor Kate O'Shea and Hard-Eyed Commando Gerry Phipps on a mission to aid new allies, the Soviet Union, as they try to interpret some bizarre reports from the Eastern Front. Then ... there are unexplained Hebrew characters, a ruin at the front, a mysterious Nazi unit ... and a Golem ...
https://youtu.be/K6LO2q4q0x0
